EmailTemplate.subject: Want more control of your peering edge?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Take control of your peering edge Read our white paper for the reasons why @bytesofcloud <[[https://twitter.com/bytesofcloud/status/1095857731217416192]]> thinks it's really cool that Nokia automated peering has the ability to adjust all BGP options, tell you about the change, and make the change on the right device.
